EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Contact Information, Account Manager (1563547610.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Contact Information, Account Manager (1563547610.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Jamie, I hope all is well with you today. I wanted to take this opportunity to introduce myself as your Account Manager. I have been with Grand & Toy for 14 years in various roles supporting our business clients and I am absolutely thrilled to have the opportunity to support you and your business. I am well versed in what we have available and how we can continue to be the partner you need. Please continue to use our Customer Service Centre for your order management and related needs. I am here to ensure you have what you need to be successful. Please contact me should you have any questions, concerns or for your business needs. Thank you again and I am looking forward to working with you. Cheers, Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom| Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents
http://grandandtoy.com <[[http://grandandtoy.com/]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this email and attached document(s) may contain confidential information that is intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system.​
